specifications.Finish: Chemical > Sand Wash Sand wash gives fabric a soft handfeel and a vintage look. By rotating and gently abrading the surface, it creates a smoother touch and a subtle washed effect. This process also enhances drape. However, due to the nature of the treatment, color variations may occur between batches, so a wider shade tolerance is often required.
specifications.Care Advice: Woven > Satin Weave > Satin This fabric is easily damaged by rubbing or scratching, so please handle it with care. Regenerated > Viscose Rayon This fabric can shrink or become distorted if it get wet. Store it in a cool, dry, well-ventilated location. Regenerated > Modal This fabric can shrink or become distorted if it get wet. Store it in a cool, dry, well-ventilated location.
specifications.Care Instructions: Hand wash only Wash separately Turn inside out before washing, Do not wring Do not bleach Line dry Do not iron Recommended Use Dresses, Pajamas
